COSC461.Greed

Class StateNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • COSC461.Greed.StateNode

  • public class StateNode
extends java.lang.Object
    A Node in the "Tree". Any instance of this node may be freely manipulated as it will not change the actual game state.
    Author:
    Adam J. Conover, D.Sc. <aconover@towson.edu>
